Body:
"""
        Test that a Pie public key can be converted into a core public key.
        """
pie_key = pobjects.PublicKey(enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, 2048, self.
    public_bytes, enums.KeyFormatType.PKCS_1)
core_key = self.factory.convert(pie_key)
self.assertIsInstance(core_key, secrets.PublicKey)
self._test_core_key(core_key, enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA, 2048, self.
    public_bytes, enums.KeyFormatType.PKCS_1)
